body.p: At Genl Jerry Boyle's request, I write for a commission as Notary Public for A. O. Durband -- of this city. Whatever fee you is required will be sent you on receipt of commission. Please state amount in your enclosure and direct to Genl J. T. Boyle here.
I may want such commission myself and will let you know shortly.
Remember me to the Governor most kindly and to the immitable "Van" -- and accept my regards for yourself

Maj. Jas S. Page
Asst. Sect of State
Frankfort Ky

Notary
Jefferson Co
A O Durband
apptd
6th Sept/64
